errors.iNeedThesePerms:
The following permissions are not present to proceed correctly:
{{PERMSLIST}}
errors.denied: You are not authorized to use this. This commands requires a Elevation Rank of {{rankNeed}}, your Rank is {{rankMe}}. Contact the Server owner or a Mod.
errors.disabledModule: :no_entry_sign: Our master has declared {{module}} forbidden here. That's too bad.
errors.genericInvalid: Oh my, Seems that Command is Invalid ;~;
errors.prefixChng: Alright, My prefix is now {{prefix}}, try it out using '{{prefix}}stats'.
errors.moderationNeeded: Excuse me, you cannot use this command. You need either **Manage Server** permissions or be assigned into a Mod/Administrative Role (Set one with `{{prefix}}modrole [@Role])`
errors.kinNone: You need to tell me who I'm supposed to kick. Of course, I could always kick you instead.
errors.kin404: I can't seem to find this person. Did they already leave? Perhaps they were a part of your imagination.
errors.unmutable: No matter what you say, I will not mute this person.
errors.unperm: I don't have the Perms to do this. Perhaps you should give me the Perms before commanding me to do something.
errors.noRoleHere: Seems that Role isn't listed. Make sure you are telling me the role correctly.
errors.noRolesGiven: No Role was mentioned, are you doing it right?
errors.roleAlreadyHere: Seems that Role is already on the list.
errors.nosuchrole: Um, I couldn't find this role, type its name exactly please.
errors.kbanNone: I need a target to ban, I could always ban you instead.
errors.superRoleNope: It seems **{{user}}** does not have the Role **{{group}}**.
errors.banNone: I need a target to ban, I could always ban you instead.
errors.unpermB: I don't seem to have enough perms to process this.
errors.cantFindMessageID: Hmmm...That's not right... This Message ID seems to be invalid.
errors.cantFindChannel: I can't seem to find that channel. Try using #channel to make sure it exists.
errors.noChannelGiven: You need to tell me which channel to log the activities into.
errors.emojiError: I couldn't add this Emoji. Check reaction permissions or if the Emoji is valid...
errors.insuperms: {{imsorry}} I can't do that for you if you don't have permission yourself.
errors.not-a-NSFW-channel: This channel isn't set to NSFW. Don't go leaving your "artwork" everywhere.

warnings.translationTexTooLong:

 But don't worry, I've trimmed the text for you~
warnings.open1: Excuse me, open is a transitive verb, which means you should tell me what to open~ Try one of these options:
warnings.open2: Sorry but that's not something I can (or want to) open. But I'm sure I can open you one of these:
warnings.enterVoiceBetterExperience: You have to be in a voice channel for the full ~experience~.

moderation.didban: I've *politely* asked {{target}} to leave. **Reason:** *{{reason}}* Please give me some time to clean up their mess as well.

langIntro.global: Okay, from now on I'll speak {{LANGUAGE}} in this server. {{LANGJOKE}}
langIntro.channel: I'll speak {{LANGUAGE}} here, just for you.
langIntro.language_joke:
[NOTE TO TRANSLATOR] This is not an usual translation string, please replace this ENTIRE string with a light-hearted stereotype joke about Pollux speaking this language, preferably something that makes sense for speakers of that language. 
 EXAMPLES:
 [BRAZILIAN PORTUGUESE] - 'because nobody cares about portugal afterall'
 [KOREAN] 'i can already feel my APM rising'
 [FRENCH] 'don't even dare to make baguette jokes'
 [RUSSIAN] 'now bring me a vodka'
 -use your creativity to come up with a cool and original one!

[NOTE FOR USERS: **If you're reading this awkward bunch of text, please blame the translator for not doing a good job on translating this]

profile.persotexUpdate:
I've changed your personal text to: {{pstext}}
Use `{{prefix}}profile` to see the new line on your ProfileCard. I'm sure someone will enjoy it.

trade.exchangeWhat: What you want to give in exchange?
trade.has10toOffer: {{targetName}} has 10s to offer something in exchange

items.confirmDestroy: Are you sure you want to destroy this item?
items.destroyed: Item destroyed! This is what remained from it:

divorce.confirmdiag: Do you agree to get a divorce from {{user}}? A fee of %EMJ% **5000 Rubines** will be charged from **both** of you. Both of your LovePoints will be **halved** as well!
divorce.saidnope: {{userB}} doesn't want a divorce. You can force it by paying %EMJ%**10000 Rubines** so I can call in a lawyer to resolve this, but both of you will lose **all of your LovePoints** !
divorce.saidnothing: {{userB}} doesn't seem to be around to say anything. You can still force a one-sided divorce by paying %EMJ%**15000 Rubines** so I can call in a lawyer to resolve this, but you will lose **all of your LovePoints**!
divorce.saidyep: {{userB}} has agreed to a friendly divorce.
divorce.forced_rej: Alright. I called in a Lawyer to deal with the situation, you're no longer married!
divorce.info:
Unhappy with your loved one? You can undo your marriage at anytime by paying some Rubines.
You can do this mutually if your counterpart agrees, or you can call in a lawyer to get things done.

Divorcing will consume love points from both partys. So please be sure that this is what you want. The ring used in this marriage **will be destroyed**!

nuke.confirm:
**__This will reset all server-specific settings, including:__**
```
 -Prefix
 -ModRoles
 -Enabled/Disabled Commands and Modules
 -Drops of Rubines will be turned OFF
 -LevelUp Messages will be turned ON
 -Custom Reactions will be wiped 
 -Log Channels
```
 -This nuke will be notified in my Support Server. For everyone to see how much you fucked up. 
 -You will be unable to Nuke for 48 hours if you abuse this command I decide whether you're abusing or not. Recurring abuse and I block the command at this server.


 **Do you really wish me to send nukes?** 
 send **ok** for yes, **c** for cancel.
nuke.confirmB:
**Write the nuke reason below to confirm**
 Send **c** for cancel.
nuke.completed: Server Info has been successfully wiped and reset. Try using **+serverinfo** to see if everything was properly reset. I'm no responsible for any afterward Nuclear Fallout contamination.

reactroles.removeAll: I've removed all Reactions Registry from here. But you'll have to clear manually any reactions from the messages themselves.
reactroles.noroleshere: There are no Reaction Roles in this server.
reactroles.noReactionDel: To delete a Role Reaction, use `{{prefix}}reactionroles del [MESSAGE ID] [EMOJI]`. You can ommit `EMOJI` if you want to delete all Reactions from that Message too~
reactroles.success: Reaction Roles will be seen in this message:

shuffle.lessthan2: I need at very least two things to choose from...

help.greetings:
**Greetings! I'm Pollux. The new maid assigned to your server.**
Here's some quick explanations of my abilities:

  •  The Default Prefix is `+`, you can change it with `+prefix <New Prefix>`. 
      The Global Prefix is `p!`, useful for users that don't know your custom prefix, can be disabled at the **Dashboard**. 
      The Universal Prefix is `plx!` and cannot be disabled.
help.basics:
**The Basics** - Getting started with me is as easy as building your own parcticle accelerator! ...wait, you never built one yourself? Well, no problem!
These are just a few of the {{commandcount}} commands I have!
help.quick_getgo: Commands you should know from the get-go
help.quick_enjoy: Commands you might enjoy playing around with
help.avail_cmdlist: List of commands currently available and supported ({{commandcount}}).
help.notenough: Is this tiny box not enough?
help.currency_overview:
My currency system is relatively complex and has several limitations and protective features. Every transaction is logged and can be traced easily, that ensures your hardwork will not be eclipsed by cheaters. We log over 30 thousand transactions every day.   
        
    •  Everyone starts with a bunch of **Jades** and **Rubines**, and with one **Lootbox**.
​
help.rubines_desc:
*My main currency, bright-pink gemstones made of special hexagonal scalenohedrons of Al₂O₃:Cr, used for pretty much everything!*
        Can be obtained from Daily Bonuses (`daily`), Lootboxes (`+box`) and Gambling Games (`+blackjack`, `+slots`, etc.). As well as from trades with other users once you reach Level 5 and has at least a 10-day Daily Streak.
help.jades_desc:
*Crafting "currency", I use these faint-teal gems - otherwise worthless - to concoct special items just for you!*
        Can be obtained from Lootboxes, destroying Items, donating, or buying.
help.sapphires_desc:
*Premium currency, deep-blue pieces of the finest Sapphire gemstones, used to craft special items or as a buying currency to exclusive stuff.*
        Can be only obtained with donations, buying, and from special events. You get one Free Sapphire every 200 and 365 Dailies, and there's a 0.1% chance of getting one from Ultra Rare Lootboxes.
help.lootboxes_desc:
*Special chests that contain many goodies like Backgrounds, Medals, Rubines, and Sticker Boosters*
        Can be only obtained leveling up or from random drops, drops occur based on chat activity.

         **`⚠ Intentionally Spamming to force Loot Drops, cheating, or exchanging items with Alt-Accounts will get you banned from Pollux and other bots as well.`**
help.end:
**The complete list of Commands can be found at <https://pollux.gg/commands>**

Check out our Partners at **<https://pollux.gg/partners>**
See or submit fan-created artwork at **<https://pollux.gg/fanart>**
See your public Profile at **<https://pollux.gg/profile/me>**

**Cosmetics**
Background Shop **https://pollux.gg/bgshop**
Medal Shop **https://pollux.gg/medalshop**
Crafting Workshop **https://pollux.gg/crafting**
Virtual Stickers **<https://pollux.gg/stickers>** (for IRL stickers check Support Server)
Events Information **<https://pollux.gg/events>**

Support me at **<https://patreon.com/Pollux>** or **<https://pollux.gg/donate>**
Follow me on Twitter **<https://twitter.com/maidPollux>**

---

**For anything else, check the __Dashboard__: <https://pollux.gg/dashboard>**
Or join my support server: **​ https://discord.gg/rEBCccS ​**
Invite me to your server at **<https://pollux.gg/invite>**

flags.title: Guess the Flag

flags.noGuess: {{interjectionB}} Looks like nobody guessed it... Better luck next time!

coinflip.coinDefeat: {{interjection}} You seem to have lost...better luck next time!

dice.invalidRoll: Invalid Roll Equation -- Only the dice will be rolled!
dice.onlyRoll5: You can only roll 5 different dices at a once!
dice.limit25: Dice streak can be shown for up to 25 rolls.
dice.noDiceRolled: Wait, there's no dices for me to roll, use `{{prefix}}roll help` if you're not sure of what you're doing~
dice.exceedLim: This Roll exceeds Character Limits, try using `-nostreak` to ommit roll values

blackjack.ongoing: You should really finish a game before trying to start another.
blackjack.newgame: Blackjack huh? You should already know the rules, so let's get started.
blackjack.youlose: Oh? I've won, too bad for you.
blackjack.hit: Respond with `hit` to draw one more card,
blackjack.double: `double` to double your bet and draw one last card,
blackjack.even: Seems that we broke even, here, have your rubines back.

slots.kommunism: Communist Jackpot! Your prize has been redistributed among the populous, you get 3x what they do.
slots.pollux_jackpot: Oh my, Seems to be three of me. Perhaps you deserve something... extra.
slots.jackpot: In addition to your prize, you have also gained 100 rings and an extra life
slots.bonanza: So many Rubines! Hope you don't plan on making me carry all these.
slots.potato: Potatoes... I can probably make something out of these for you.
slots.zero_1: Oh my, seems all your Rubines are mine now.
slots.zero_2: Not a single hit? that's a shame.
slots.zero_3: Perhaps if you try again you might win something?

games.ceilingBet: You can't bet more than **{{number}}** $t(keywords.RBN_plural) in this game.

loot.rareDrop: Do you know what is this? It is a **RARE** Lootbox!
loot.ultraRareDrop: I can't believe it, an **ULTRA RARE** Lootbox has dropped! you may never see one again!
lootDrop: Oh my, a Lootbox has just spawned in this channel!
Someone seems to have dropped a Lootbox here.
Sorry to interrupt, but did anyone notice this Lootbox lying over here?
Amazing! Look at what I've found!
Hey, I'm pretty sure you want to see this Lootbox here.
loot.lootPick: You all have **__20 Seconds__** to dispute it! Type `{{prefix}}pick` for a chance to claim it!
loot.goesTo:
Time's up! Let's see who's getting this Box.
**This Loot Box will be raffled between:**
loot.congrats: Well done! The box has been added to your **Inventory**. You can open it using the `{{prefix}}lootbox` command.
loot.options: You can either keep it, or reroll it by paying {{amt}}
loot.rerolled: Let's try again, rerolling the box content...
loot.noMoreRolls: You've ran out of rerolls, you'll have to stick with this result.
loot.noFunds: You need more Rubines to reroll, perhaps next time.
loot.addedRubines: {{X}} Rubines have been added to your Balance
loot.addedJades: {{X}} Jades have been added to your Pouch
loot.addedMedal: **{{itm}}** Medal has been added to your Medals Pocket
loot.addedSticker: **{{itm}}** Sticker has been added to your Stickers Album
loot.addedBG: Background `[code:{{itm}}]` has been added to your Backgrounds Binder
loot.duplicateExchange: Duplicate {{tpe}} `{{itm}}` has been exchanged for {{X}} Rubines
loot.morons: You let a Lootbox slip by? What am I saying, of course you did.
loot.eventDrop: And there is more! This box is an **EVENT BOX** which means: **'special goodies inside'!**
loot.notThisbox: You don't seem to have that box. try `{{prefix}}lootbox` again and see the boxes you own.

eastereggs.konodioda: You thought that it was Pollux, **but it was ME, DIO**!
eastereggs.vacuum: **{{user}}** has given **+1 Rep** to the Void. {{amount}} reps have been thrown into there so far.
